Heavy-handed and built like an ox, these Giants have been practicing their haymaker punch!
Super ultra heavyweight champions of the Clash boxing league.

Siege Machines are special weapons created in the Workshop that carry your Clan Castle troops.

Each Siege Machine specializes in a different way of delivering destruction. You can build multiple Siege Machines, that way you can choose which one you want to use at the start of the battle. <cFCE27F>What is the Battle Week? </c>

During each battle week, your clan will be grouped with seven other clans from your league tier. Over the next seven days, your clan will war with each of the other clans to determine who's the best in your group! Clans that do well can get promoted to the next higher league tier while the bottom performing clans will get dropped to the next tier below your current one.

When a battle week starts, your clan will first enter into preparation period for your first war day. During the preparation day you can choose the participants for the next war from everyone who signed up. After 24 hours have passed, the first war day will begin. Simultaneously, preparations for the second war day will also begin!

<cFCE27F>How is the leaderboard ranked?</c>\n\nYou can check where your Clan currently stands in comparison to the 7 other Clans in your League group by viewing the Leaderboard. The Leaderboard displays the status of your Clan's performance throughout the Battle Week and is based on the total number of Stars earned. Your clan earns an additional 10 Stars for each won war. The more Stars you earn, the higher your Clan will rank!

Your reward limit depends on your clan´s league level and position at the end of the season. You earn at least 20% of the rewards and 10% more for each obtained star. For 8 or more stars you earn the full reward.

<cFCE27F>What are Clan War Leagues?</c>\n\nClan War Leagues is the ultimate contest for clans. It is a monthly league that puts your clan against seven others to determine which is the best. You will fight against the seven other clans in seven wars over seven days. At the end, clans that have earned the most stars are promoted to higher leagues while others stay or are demoted. Next month you will resume where you left off. The higher you can get, the more rewards and glory you can earn. Keep climbing upwards with your clan and you may eventually become the best in the world!

<cFCE27F>How can my clan participate?</c>

Leaders and Co-leaders can sign your Clan up during the opt-in period. If you are participating for the first time, you will be placed into a league tier based on the strength of your fifteen strongest members. My Clan isn't very strong. Should we participate?</c>

Yes! As long as you have at least fifteen members, you should participate. You can earn great rewards even if you don't get promoted to a higher league tier!

<cFCE27F>What do we get out of Clan War Leagues?</c>

Glory of course! But there are also exclusive rewards that you can only get from participating in Clan War Leagues! Earning Stars during battle week will earn you League Medals. The higher your league tier, the more League Medals you will earn. You can exchange your hard-earned League Medals in the Shop for rare Magic Items and other unique prizes.

<cFCE27F>Are there other ways to earn League Medals?</c>

Clan leadership can award a limited number of bonus Medals to anyone participating, even if they didn't fight! You get more and bigger bonuses in higher league tiers, with each win giving you an extra one!
